channel.title: No driver found
channel.description: Hey guys, i keep getting this error when i run my server : [code] [3/3/13 12:51 AM]: Vote Handler: Success [3/3/13 12:51 AM]: java.sql.SQLException: No suitable driver found for runeleak.biz [3/3/13 12:51 AM]: Failed to connect to MySQL Database! [3/3/13 12:51 AM]: LS successfully started, current server port:43594 [3/3/13 12:51 AM]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) [3/3/13 12:51 AM]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) [3/3/13 12:51 AM]: at server.util.Highscores.process(Highscores.java:20) [3/3/13 12:51 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:162) [3/3/13 12:51 AM]: Main Server Ticking event started. [3/3/13 12:51 AM]: [Donating] Connected [/code]

item.title: No driver found
item.dc:creator: @StonedC0D3r StonedC0D3r
item.description:
@StonedC0D3r wrote:

Hey guys, i keep getting this error when i run my server :

[3/3/13 12:51 AM]: Vote Handler: Success
[3/3/13 12:51 AM]: java.sql.SQLException: No suitable driver found for runeleak.biz
[3/3/13 12:51 AM]: Failed to connect to MySQL Database!
[3/3/13 12:51 AM]: LS successfully started, current server port:43594
[3/3/13 12:51 AM]: 	at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source)
[3/3/13 12:51 AM]: 	at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source)
[3/3/13 12:51 AM]: 	at server.util.Highscores.process(Highscores.java:20)
[3/3/13 12:51 AM]: 	at server.Server.main(Server.java:162)
[3/3/13 12:51 AM]: Main Server Ticking event started.
[3/3/13 12:51 AM]: [Donating] Connected

Read full topic
